effect_entries.effect: Teaches Iron Tail to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Smack Down to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Iron Tail Gen I: Dragon Rage)

flavor_text_entries.text:
石や　弾を　投げて　飛んでいる
相手を　攻撃する。相手は
うちおとされて　地面に　おちる。

The user throws a stone or similar projectile
to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon
will fall to the ground when it’s hit.

Chi la usa lancia una pietra o un proiettile. Può
colpire anche un bersaglio in volo e farlo cadere.

Ataque que desconcierta por su rapidez y que no
falla nunca.

Greift das Ziel mit Steinen und Wurfgeschossen
an. Fliegende Ziele fallen vom Himmel
und landen auf dem Boden.

Le lanceur jette toutes sortes de projectiles à
un ennemi. Si ce dernier vole, il tombe au sol.

돌이나 구슬을 던져서 날고 있는
상대를 공격한다.
맞은 상대는 땅에 떨어진다.

いしや　たまを　なげて　とんでいる
あいてを　こうげきする。あいては
うちおとされて　じめんに　おちる。

The user throws a stone or projectile
to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon
will fall to the ground when it’s hit.

The user throws a stone or projectile
to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon
will fall to the ground when it’s hit.

Le lanceur jette toutes sortes
de projectiles à un ennemi. Si ce
dernier vole, il tombe au sol.

The foe is slammed with a sturdy
tail of steel. It may also lower the
target’s Defense stat if it hits.

The foe is slammed with a sturdy
tail of steel. It may also lower the
target’s Defense stat if it hits.

The foe is slammed with a sturdy
tail of steel. It may also lower the
target’s Defense stat if it hits.

An attack with a
steel-hard tail.
It may lower the
foe’s DEFENSE stat.

Slams the foe with
a hard tail. It may
lower DEFENSE.

Slams the foe with
a hard tail. It may
lower DEFENSE.
